scripts.dev:inspect: nodemon -e ts,json --exec node --inspect=localhost:9222 -r ts-node/register --loader ts-node/esm src/main.ts
scripts.clinic:doctor: tsc && clinic doctor --on-port 'autocannon -m POST localhost: 8000/users/register' -- node prod/main.js
scripts.clinic:flame: tsc && clinic flame --on-port 'autocannon -m POST localhost: 8000/users/register' -- node prod/main.js
